Hi,

Does anybody know if it’s possible while hosting a HubSpot CMS site on your root domain, to then reverse proxy in say for example a French version on <http://example.com/fr|example.com/fr> (with <http://example.com|example.com> being a HubSpot site)?

Thanks in advance!

Hi all, I'm creating a carousel of recent posts and I'm using css and flexbox to 'grow/shrink' the size of my post containers on hover. The issue I'm having is that I need to add a containing div around 3 posts at a time. Is there a way to do this within the posts loop? My container ends up wrapping every post. Would I do this with loop.index or is there another way to make this happen? Basically I need to be able to say - for every 3 posts, add this container around those posts

Do you know what could be wrong?
